title: 88/581/EEC: Commission Decision of 24 October 1988 on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Italy pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 24 October 1988
on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Italy pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85
(Only the Italian version of this text is authentic)
(88/581/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Taking into account the provisions relating to the fixation of the reference income for 1987, the measures adopted by the Italian regioni pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 and which were the subject of a favourable decision pursuant to Article 25 of that Regulation continue to meet the conditions for a financial contribution from the Community to the common measure provided for in Article 1 of Regulation (EEC) No 797/85.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 October 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 108, 29. 4. 1988, p. 1.
